def_cn: （建筑等）哥特式的，哥特风格的
def_en: Gothic architecture and religious art was produced in the Middle Ages. Its features include tall pillars, high curved ceilings, and pointed arches.

def_cn: （小说）哥特派的（描写怪诞、神秘的恐怖故事）
def_en: In Gothic stories, strange, mysterious adventures happen in dark and lonely places such as graveyards and old castles.

def_cn: （印刷或书写文字）哥特体的，花体的，德文老式字体的
def_en: Gothic is used to describe a style of printing or writing in which the letters are very decorative. German books and signs were often written in Gothic script.
